goal.ch: "Purpose of the course: The course of Money and Banking covers three main themes. First, we introduce the structure, instruments, operation, and regulations of the financial markets. Their relationship with and impacts on the economy will be emphasized in particular. Second, we will introduce the roles, operation, management, and supervision of the banking system. Its potential problems and relationship with the economy are the focuses of discussion. Last, we will introduce the central banks, monetary policies, and the international financial system. Generally speaking, this course provides a broad view of the monetary and financial sectors of an economy, and how they interact with the economy to affect its performance."
